text:
Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort rolls out Relax & Enjoy package for travelers Published on : Monday, August 10, 2015
Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort, the beachfront property that has transformed the Kuta experience, has announced its Relax & Enjoy package for travelers to unwind and indulge at the beautiful resort. Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort is accepting Relax & Enjoy bookings now for stays through December 31, 2015.
“Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort’s Relax & Enjoy package is ideal for guests to treat themselves to a restful and re-energizing getaway surrounded by beauty and luxury in the heart of Kuta Beach,” said General Manager Dario Orsini. “The authentic Balinese hospitality our team gives to every guest, combined with the resort’s outstanding amenities and services, will ensure memorable stays and added value through this offering.”
Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort designed its Relax & Enjoy offering to enhance guests’ stay with exclusive savings and additional services for guest convenience. Relax & Enjoy guests will receive a refreshing drink upon arrival, a sumptuous buffet breakfast for two each day, 30 percent savings at all restaurants, complimentary WiFi throughout the resort, a one-way airport transfer that includes use of the Golden Bird Lounge at Ngurah Rai International Airport, as well as late check-out on the day of departure (until 4 p.m.).
Relax & Enjoy room rates start from USD 154++ per room per night, and are available for stays through December 31, 2015. A minimum two-night stay is required. The offer is subject to availability and should be booked at least three days prior to arrival. Blackout dates and other restrictions may apply. Not to be combined with other offers or promotions and subject to change.
Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort offers an exclusive retreat, with a spacious open-air terrace, outdoor rooftop pool and unrivalled panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. The resort offers 203 guest rooms and suites ranging from 46 to 265 square meters, each fitted with the signature Sheraton Sweet Sleeper® Bed and featuring a spacious private balcony with uninterrupted ocean views or the resort’s signature social courtyard. Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort also features a signature two-story Presidential Suite with contemporary Balinese interior and private sundeck lounge.
Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort has three dining venues where travelers can enjoy Sheraton’s signature restaurants – the all-day dining Feast® with its vibrant open-kitchen, located alongside beachwalk patio overlooking the Kuta Beach; Bene – a light-hearted Italian kitchen with oceanic setting, where guests can also relish mesmerizing views of the beautiful Bali Strait on the rooftop deck level; and The Lounge featuring locally inspired cocktails and an open-air setting overlooking the Indian Ocean.
To keep travelers fit and energized, Sheraton Bali Kuta Resort introduces Sheraton Fitness by Core Performance™ with lifestyle designed training programs and encompassing a fully equipped fitness center, Shine Spa for Sheraton that will pamper and rejuvenate guests with signature treatments blending from the East to the West with local Balinese touches and Color Your Plate™ a simple three colors approach to a healthy food program.
